Input: Add a home adresses/several adresses to make the ordering process faster

I currently order a lot from multiple places (office, home, partners home) and I would like the information to be saved to my account so I can select a profile in order to avoid typing all my information every time
Option to pay more for faster service
I would sometimes be willing to pay more if it guarenteed the delivery to be on the requested time if it is a busy time
I would like to be able to search for a dish with all its information next to being able to search for restaurant types

As a frequent user, I sometimes wish to order a specific dish. For instance, Lasagna. Not every Pizza place has lasagna, so I would find it easier to categorize the food. This way, it would be easier to order some of my favourite dishes.
Allergy information of the dishes should be more complete, so that I don't have an unexpected allergic reaction

If the dishes would have a database containing the ingredients, and I could create an allergy profile in my Thuisbezord Profile, the App could warn me if a certain dish I ordered contains anything that I might be allergic to. This way, I can avoid an allergic reaction more carefully.
